alert.note: Alert for Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 25 at 8:00PM CDT until October 27 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Denton Creek Near Justin affecting Denton County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Denton Creek near Justin. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur to farm and ranch lands near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 2.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 10.2 feet tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
